content.text: Match ends, Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 3.
Second Half ends, Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 3.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Christopher Schindler.
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Victor Moses.
Jonathan Hogg (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Corner,  Huddersfield Town. Conceded by Marcos Alonso.
Philip Billing (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Victor Moses (Chelsea).
Attempt blocked. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Terence Kongolo (Huddersfield Town) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Terence Kongolo (Huddersfield Town).
Substitution, Chelsea. Victor Moses replaces Pedro.
Goal!  Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 3. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Substitution, Chelsea. Eden Hazard replaces Willian.
Attempt missed. Laurent Depoitre (Huddersfield Town) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Florent Hadergjonaj.
Philip Billing (Huddersfield Town) hits the bar with a header from the right side of the box. Assisted by Aaron Mooy with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).
Jonathan Hogg (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Philip Billing (Huddersfield Town) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Laurent Depoitre.
Substitution, Huddersfield Town. Adama Diakhaby replaces Chris Löwe.
David Luiz (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Laurent Depoitre (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David Luiz (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Ruben Loftus-Cheek replaces Ross Barkley.
Hand ball by Laurent Depoitre (Huddersfield Town).
Attempt missed. Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Terence Kongolo (Huddersfield Town).
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Zanka.
Attempt blocked. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ross Barkley.
Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Zanka (Huddersfield Town).
Aaron Mooy (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ross Barkley (Chelsea).
Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box. Assisted by Antonio Rüdiger following a corner.
Attempt missed. Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Willian with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Ben Hamer.
Attempt saved. Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Willian with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Christopher Schindler.
Attempt blocked. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marcos Alonso with a cross.
Philip Billing (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).
Attempt blocked. Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jonathan Hogg (Huddersfield Town).
Substitution, Huddersfield Town. Laurent Depoitre replaces Alex Pritchard.
Second Half begins Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 2.
First Half ends, Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 2.
Goal!  Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 2. Jorginho (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Christopher Schindler (Huddersfield Town) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty conceded by Christopher Schindler (Huddersfield Town) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Chelsea. Marcos Alonso draws a foul in the penalty area.
Foul by Marcos Alonso (Chelsea).
Florent Hadergjonaj (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Ross Barkley (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Steve Mounie (Huddersfield Town) hits the left post with a header from the centre of the box. Assisted by Zanka with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Huddersfield Town. Conceded by Antonio Rüdiger.
Goal!  Huddersfield Town 0, Chelsea 1. N'Golo Kanté (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Willian with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Chris Löwe.
Ross Barkley (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Offside, Huddersfield Town. Philip Billing tries a through ball, but Chris Löwe is caught offside.

Offside, Huddersfield Town. Ben Hamer tries a through ball, but Steve Mounie is caught offside.
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
